summary: This is an alternative start for Skyrim. Not a hardcore-rpg-start, but a nice little try to have some fun with a cute and experienced Imperial.
descriptionHtml:
\"It\'s not the time for breeding horses, my dear. It\'s the time for heroes! Once I was an adventurer, but then I took an arrow in the knee. Now it\'s up to you, Shantara. Many realms of Tamriel are craving for an adventurer. Don\'t stay at home. Fame and fortune are waiting ...\"
Her Father has taught her all the things he ever learned while hunting down bandits, fighting strange creatures and looting caves filled up with treasures. 
He showed her how to fight with a blade, how to shoot with a bow and how to use her shield properly. 
Her mother crafted her an armor, her uncle gets her some weapons - and off she went. 
After wandering through Cyrodiil for a while she decided to leave the grounds of her ancestry and cross the border to Skyrim. 
And there she is - in a weird part of Tamriel. On her way to Falkreath she\'d heard stories about Stormcloaks and Imperials, about a rotten town called Riften and horkers - she couldn\'t wait to see all these things ...

Like I said, Shantara is not a rookie. Her father provided her with some skills and perks; so this is not a hardcore rpg-start: 
Archery (40)
-	Overdrawn 1
-	Eagle Eye
-	Critical Shot
-	Steady Hand 1
Block (30)
-	Shield Wall 1
-	Deflects Arrows
Light Armor (30)
-	Agile Defender 1
-	Custom Fit
One Handed (40)
-	Armsman 1
-	Fighting Stance
-	Bladesman 1
Smithing (50)
-	Steel
-	Elven
-	Advanced
Sneak (40)
-	Stealth 1
-	Backstab
-	Muffled Movements
Health: 160
Stamina: 160
Magicka: 150
I set CarryWeight to 800 and her Level to 17. 
She is equipped with: 
-	Leather Armor
-	Leather Boots
-	Leather Bracers
-	Leather Helmet
-	Hide Shield
-	Hunting Bow
-	Steel Sword
-	8 Potions of minor Healing
-	5 Potions of minor Stamina
-	2 Bear Pelts
-	5 Wolf Pelts
-	600 Septims
The other Skills (without perks) are: 
-	Two handed 15
-	Heavy Armor 15
-	Alchemy 20
-	Lockpicking 15
-	Pickpocket 15
-	Speechcraft 15
-	Alteration 15
-	Destruction 15
-	Enchanting 15
-	Illusion 20
-	Restoration 15
-	Conjuration 15
The Main Quest is disabled, there are no deeds to do. You can do whatever you like - just fill up her quest book :-)

***
And now for something completely different:

This is not a brand new alternative start, because I couldn\'t do this. I altered \"Azia Nightshade Alternative Start by Joel Strawbridge\" so I have to thank him for his good work! The original mod: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=6498

I used some mods to create Shantara: 
Better Females by Bella: 
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=2812
Athletic Nude Women - CBBE by Valstein0: 
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=563
Coolsims Hair Pack by newermind43: 
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=3809
No More Blocky Faces by Xenius: 
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=30

My thanks to Bethesda for Skyrim, Oblivion, Morrowind ... Wow, I love you.

And now - have fun :-)
author: DarkWriter
